page.title: 18FAMILY OCCUPATIONS
page.content: Many people are unemployed. My Dad is employed;he works at a place called 'Bardons', teaching people how to make ballbearings and making sure they are made properly. My Mum works at home. She knits, crochets and embroiders jumpers. She goes to the shop and gets a pattern, then has about a fortnight to make it. Then she takes it back and gets money for it. My cousin is 24;he works by delivering food to shops. He drives a big van around and gets a lot of money for it. My uncle works in an office and visits people if they have housing problems. He arranges help for them. My Auntie works in 'Debenhams' which is a big department store. She gets up early in the morning and gets back late. My Grandad is an artist. He draws scenes. He often does craft as well.My sister works at a hairdressers on Saturdays and enjoys it very much.
